relation: Actually an old topic but wanted to pass on another recommendation. The Library, on E. Carson St., South Side. On the site of the old Brady Street Bridge Tavern, approximately 22nd St and E. Carson. Good selection of craft beers on tap. The bartender is very well-versed in all of them and many more. Generous with samples of the various offerings. Food is good also.
I’ve been told this before and have been meaning to check this place out. Thanks for reminding me.
The Library also has very good wings. They are kind of expensive, but they have an all you can eat wing special on Tuesday I believe. These are some of the biggest wings (of chicken) I’ve ever seen.
